[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@microsoft/api-extractor-model](./api-extractor-model.md) &gt; [ApiItem](./api-extractor-model.apiitem.md) &gt; [getAssociatedModel](./api-extractor-model.apiitem.getassociatedmodel.md)

## ApiItem.getAssociatedModel() method

If this item is an ApiModel or has an ApiModel as one of its parents, then that object is returned. Otherwise undefined is returned.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getAssociatedModel(): ApiModel | undefined;
```
**Returns:**

[ApiModel](./api-extractor-model.apimodel.md) \| undefined
